circumstances: En route from Uruapan to Lázaro Cárdenas, while cruising in poor weather conditions, the twin engine airplane struck the slope of a mountain located about 15 km from Arteaga, in the Sierra Madre Mountain Range. The aircraft disintegrated on impact and all 20 occupants were killed.
probable_cause: Controlled flight into terrain. For unknown reasons, the aircraft was flying at an insufficient altitude.
